note.p: Servant to the Darwins. Daughter of Joseph Parslow’s younger brother John. Nurserymaid at Down, 1861; lady’s maid to the Darwins, 1871. Married Joshua Arthur Snow, farmer, of Down, in London in 1871.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/370/16/4/3), 1851 (HO107/1963/83/4), 1861 (RG9/462/74/10), 1871 (RG10/157/81/16), 1881 (RG11/855/85/5)
Gloucestershire, England, Church of England baptisms, 1813–1913 (Ancestry.com, accessed 11 January 2018)
London, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754–1931 (Ancestry.com, accessed 11 January 2018)
